amendment.description: Amendments en bloc No. 6 consisting of amendments numbered 39, 41, 43, 50, as modified; 51, and 57 printed in House Report 111-498.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments nos. 39, 41, 43, 50, as modified, 51, and 57 printed in House Report 111-498.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A016) offered by Mr. Andrews.
On agreeing to the Andrews amendments (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
